content.text: 2 tablespoons cooking oil
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 tablespoons cooking oil" )

content.text: 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces" )

content.text: sea salt to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "sea salt to taste" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste" )

content.text: 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste" )

content.text: 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder" )

content.text: ground black pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "ground black pepper to taste" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper" )

content.text: 1 small yellow onion, diced
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 small yellow onion, diced" )

content.text: 1 medium green bell pepper, diced
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 medium green bell pepper, diced" )

content.text: 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced" )

content.text: 5 cups water
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "5 cups water" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained
content.eamr: ( ing-13 "1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained" )

content.text: 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-14 "1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco)
content.eamr: ( ing-15 "1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco)" )

content.text: 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste
content.eamr: ( ing-16 "1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste" )

content.text: 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-17 "1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped" )

content.text: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oil"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@36:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@19:30 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place chicken in the pot; brown on all sides.
2) Season with sea salt, chili powder, cumin, ground chipotle, black pepper,  and cayenne pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sea salt"@15:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "chili powder"@25:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cumin"@39:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "ground chipotle"@46:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "black pepper"@63:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cayenne pepper"@82:96 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Mix in onion, green bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "onion"@10:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "green bell pepper"@17:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "yellow bell pepper"@40:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Pour in about 3 cups water, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until about 1/2 the water has evaporated.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Pour in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "3 cups water"@17:29 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cooking"@44:51 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "10 minutes"@52:62 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until about 1/2 the water has evaporated"@64:104 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-12 "the kidney beans"@7:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "black beans"@25:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-14 "corn"@42:46 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "the pot"@52:59 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Season with green pepper sauce.
7) Reduce heat to low, and mix in remaining 2 cups water and tomato paste.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Reduce"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@10:14 / OTHER )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "low"@18:21 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "mix in"@27:33 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "remaining 2 cups water"@34:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-16 "tomato paste"@61:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Simmer, stirring occasionally 30 minutes, or until thickened.
9) Top with cilantro to serve.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Top"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-17 "cilantro"@13:21 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to serve"@22:30 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
